subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Allowing an average of 101 yards a game on the ground, good for seventh in the N.F.L., the Redskins smothered LeSean McCoy, Philadelphia’s star running back, limiting him to 22 yards on 19 carries in Week 3.
snippet: Allowing an average of 101 yards a game on the ground, good for seventh in the N.F.L., the Redskins smothered LeSean McCoy, Philadelphia’s star running back, limiting him to 22 yards on 19 carries in Week 3.
